metadata.title: CVE-2024-23449 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An uncaught exception in Elasticsearch >= 8.4.0 and < 8.11.1 occurs when anencrypted PDF is passed to an attachment processor through the REST API.The Elasticsearch ingest node that attempts to parse the PDF file willcrash. This does not happen with password-protected PDF files or withunencrypted PDF files.

criterions.comment: elasticsearch package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
